column2: This chapter contains content to do with the Sociology of Virology

column1: How does Sociology pertain to everyday life? (Coronavirus Flashcards)
Why is it important to know about the field of Sociology to do with viruses? (Coronavirus Flashcards)
column2: The way the people behave and interact forms a big part of the way diseases spread. Understanding more about Sociology allows you to better solutions to an outbreak
